.. _custom_cmap:

******************************************************
Custom Colormap (:mod:`labreportpy.color.custom_cmap`)
******************************************************

.. currentmodule:: labreportpy.color.custom_cmap

This submodule contains a simple function to create a
colormap from a list of colors.

=============
